Posts.Content: mjcs wrote: I'm back with yet another question for you experienced ladies. As you may know I am having stage 2 reconstruction at NOLA June 13th. I have heard that the Docs there may do fairly extensive liposuction as part of the reconstruction procedure. I got to thinking about this and am wondering if the lipo process destroys the lymph system--around the stomach and back etc. Any one have any knowledge about this?? MJ Log in to post a reply
